backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor validates domain names and deploys apps, rejecting invalid names via Runtime.trap.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking Valentine UI behaviors to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose across Valentine UI and deployment features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS root theme and dark mode color tokens with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the SPA and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app showing Valentine prompt, CTA buttons, meme reveal, and deployment dialog.
frontend/src/features/deployment/Deploym: Dialog allowing users to enter and validate a domain name and trigger backend deployment.
frontend/src/features/deployment/validat: Client-side domain validator enforcing length and allowed‑character rules.
frontend/src/features/valentine/componen: Renders Yes and fleeing No buttons using pointer movement and touch interactions.
Displays success message after Yes is clicked.
Animated canvas rendering floating hearts with parallax motion.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Hook computing random repositioning for the fleeing No button on proximity or touch.
frontend/src/features/valentine/index.ts: Barrel exports Valentine components and hook.
frontend/src/features/valentine/utils/po: Pointer utilities for coordinate extraction, distance calculation, and clamping.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing, as no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive theme variables, including Valentine-themed colors and gradient utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, Valentine color variables, extended utilities, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, constraints, and known issues for the Valentine’s Day app.
